Verses: 1 yaakkobu Pirayaanampanni, Keezhththisaiyaarin Dhesaththil Poich Serndhaan.

2 ange Vayalveliyile Oru Kinatraiyum, Adhin Aruge Madakkiyirukkira Moondru Aattumandhaigalaiyum Kandaan; Andhak Kinatrile Mandhaigalukkuth Thanneer Kaattuvaargal; Andhak Kinatrin Vaai Oru Periya Kallinaal Adaikgappattirundhadhu.
3 avvidaththil Mandhaigal Ellaam Serndhapin Kinatrin Vaayilirukkum Kallai Meyppar Puratti, Aadugalukkuth Thanneer Kaatti, Marupadiyum Kallai Munnirundhapadi Kinatrin Vaayil Vaippaargal.
4 yaakkobu Avargalaip Paarththu: Sagodharare, Neengal Evvidaththaar Endraan; Avargal, Naangal Aaraan Ooraar Endraargal.
5 appozhudhu Avan: Naagorin Kumaaranaagiya Laabaanai Ariveergalaa Endru Kettaan; Arivom Endraargal.
6 avan Sugamaayirukkiraanaa Endru Visaariththaan; Adharku Avargal: Sugamaayirukkiraan; Avan Kumaaraththiyaagiya Raagel, Adho, Aadugalai Ottikkondu Varugiraal Endru Sonnaargal.
7 appozhudhu Avan: Innum Vegupozhudhirukkiradhe; Idhu Mandhaigalaich Serkkira Velai Allave, Aadugalukkuth Thanneerkaatti, Innum Meyavidalaam Endraan.
8 adharku Avargal: Ellaa Mandhaigalum Serumunne Appadich Seyyakkoodaadhu; Serndhapin Kinatrin Vaayilulla Kallaip Purattuvaargal; Appozhudhu Aadugalukkuth Thanneer Kaattuvom Endraargal.
9 avargalode Avan Pesikkondirukkumpodhe, Than Thagappanudaiya Aadugalai Meyththukkondirundha Raagel Andha Aadugalai Ottikkondu Vandhaal.

10 yaakkobu Than Thaayin Sagodharanaana Laabaanudaiya Kumaaraththiyaagiya Raagelaiyum, Than Thaayin Sagodharanaagiya Laabaanin Aadugalaiyum Kandapodhu, Yaakkobu Poi, Kinatrin Vaayilirundha Kallaip Puratti, Than Thaayin Sagodharanaagiya Laabaanin Aadugalukkuth Thanneer Kaattinaan.
11 pinbu Yaakkobu Raagelai Muththanjeydhu, Saththamittu Azhudhu,
12 thaan Aval Thagappanudaiya Marumaganendrum, Rebekkaalin Kumaaranendrum Raagelukku Ariviththaan. Aval Odippoi Than Thagappanukku Ariviththaal.

13 laabaan Than Sagodhariyin Kumaaranaagiya Yaakkobudaiya Seydhiyaik Kettapodhu, Avanukku Edhirkondodi, Avanaik Kattikkondu Muththanjeydhu, Than Veettukku Azhaiththukkonduponaan; Avan Than Kaariyangalaiyellaam Vibaramaai Laabaanukkuch Sonnaan.
14 appozhudhu Laabaan: Nee En Elumbum En Maamsamumaanavan Endraan. Oru Maadhamvaraikkum Yaakkobu Avanidaththil Thanginaan.
15 pinbu Laabaan Yaakkobai Nokki: Nee En Marumaganaayiruppadhinaal, Summaa Enakku Velai Seyyalaamaa? Sampalam Evvalavu Ketkiraai, Sol Endraan.
16 laabaanukku Irandu Kumaaraththigal Irundhaargal; Mooththaval Per Leyaal, Ilaiyaval Per Raagel.
17 leyaaludaiya Kangal Koochchap Paarvaiyaayirundhadhu: Raagelo Roobavadhiyum Paarvaikku Azhagaanavalumaayirundhaal.
18 yaakkobu Raagelperil Piriyappattu: Ummudaiya Ilaiya Kumaaraththiyaagiya Raagelukgaaga Ummidaththil Ezhu Varusham Velaiseygiren Endraan.
19 adharku Laabaan: Naan Avalai Anniya Purushanukkuk Kodukkiradhaippaarkkilum, Avalai Unakkuk Kodukkiradhu Uththamam, Ennidaththil Thariththiru Endraan.
20 andhappadiye Yaakkobu Raagelukkaaga Ezhu Varusham Velaiseydhaan; Avalperil Irundha Piriyaththinaale Andha Varushangal Avanukkuk Konjanaalaagath Thondrinadhu.
21 pinbu Yaakkobu Laabaanai Nokki: En Naatkal Niraiverinapadiyaal, En Manaiviyinidaththil Naan Serumpadi Avalai Enakkuth Tharavendum Endraan.
22 appozhudhu Laabaan Avvidaththu Manidhar Ellaaraiyum Koodivarachseydhu Virundhupanninaan.
23 andru Iravile Avan Than Kumaaraththiyaagiya Leyaalai Azhaiththukkondupoi, Avanidaththil Vittaan; Avalai Avan Serndhaan.
24 laabaan Than Velaikkaariyaagiya Silpaalaith Than Kumaaraththiyaagiya Leyaalukku Velaikkaariyaagak Koduththaan.
25 kaalaiyile, Idho, Aval Leyaal Endru Yaakkobu Kandu, Laabaanai Nokki: En Enakku Ippadich Seydheer? Raagelukkaaga Allavaa Ummidaththil Velaiseydhen; Pinnai En Enakku Vanjagampannineer Endraan.
26 adharku Laabaan: Mooththaval Irukka Ilaiyavalaik Koduppadhu Ivvidaththu Vazhakkam Alla.
27 ivaludaiya Ezhu Naalai Niraivetru; Avalaiyum Unakkuth Tharuven; Avalukkaagavum Nee Innum Ezhu Varusham Ennidaththil Velaisey Endraan.
28 andhappadiye Yaakkobu, Ivaludaiya Ezhunaalai Niraivetrinaan. Appozhudhu Than Kumaaraththiyaagiya Raagelaiyum Avanukku Manaiviyaagak Koduththaan.
29 melum Laabaan Than Velaikkaariyaagiya Pilgaalaith Than Kumaaraththiyaagiya Raagelukku Velaikkaariyaagak Koduththaan.
30 yaakkobu Raagelaiyum Serndhaan; Leyaalaippaarkkilum Raagelai Avan Adhigamaai Nesiththu, Pinnum Ezhu Varusham Avanidaththil Seviththaan.
31 leyaal Arpamaai Ennappattaal Endru Karththar Kandu, Aval Karppandharikkumpadi Seydhaar; Raagelo Maladiyaayirundhaal.
32 leyaal Karppavadhiyaagi Oru Kumaaranaip Petru: Karththar En Sirumaiyaip Paarththarulinaar; Ippozhudhu En Purushan Ennai Nesippaar Endru Solli, Avanukku Rooban Endru Perittaal.
33 marupadiyum Aval Karppavadhiyaagi Oru Kumaaranaip Petru: Naan Arpamaai Ennappattadhaik Karththar Kettaruli, Ivanaiyum Enakkuth Thandhaar Endru Solli, Avanukkuch Simiyon Endru Perittaal.
34 pinnum Aval Karppavadhiyaagi Oru Kumaaranaip Petru: En Purushanukku Moondru Kumaararaip Petrapadiyaal Avar Ippozhudhu Ennode Serndhiruppaar Endru Solli, Avanukku Levi Endru Perittaal.
35 marupadiyum Aval Karppavadhiyaagi Oru Kumaaranaip Petru: Ippozhudhu Karththaraith Thudhippen Endru Solli, Avanukku Yoodhaa Endru Perittaal; Pirpaadu Avalukkup Pillaipperu Nindrupoyitru.
